name: peer_ratio_averages
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool marketci_analytics.
Tool description: Stock Market Endpoint for Price Forecasts, Probability, Cash Flow Models , and Peer Comps 
API description: Fetches and returns an average of company peer ratios for trailing twelve months (TTM) data for a given company symbol.

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company for which to fetch peer ratio averages.
